attributes.action: Create a Independant Police force for the City of Westminster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The City of London has it's own independant Police Force, so why not give The City of Westminster it's own independant Police Force, with juristiction all over The City of Westminster. This independant force will help increase the response times of the Police in Westminster and help protech politician's, Diplomat's and the general public.
